meanings.sent1: The math problem was solvable with a little help from the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The puzzle was solvable once all the pieces were put together.
meanings.sent3: The mystery of the missing sock was finally solvable when it was found in the dryer.
meanings.sent4: Her determination made the seemingly impossible task solvable.
meanings.sent5: With patience and perseverance, even the most challenging riddles become solvable.

meanings.sent1: The conflict between the two friends was solvable through open communication.
meanings.sent2: The technical issue was solvable by restarting the computer.
meanings.sent3: The disagreement over the movie choice was easily solvable by compromising on a genre.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room was so thick, it felt almost touchably solvable.
meanings.sent5: His calm demeanor made every problem seem solvable, no matter how complex.

meanings.definition: Possible to find a solution for.
meanings.sent1: The real-life escape room was designed to be challenging but solvable.
meanings.sent2: The mystery novel presented a series of solvable clues for the detective to unravel.
meanings.sent3: The recipe for the cake was solvable, even for a beginner baker.
meanings.sent4: The path to success may have obstacles, but they are all solvable with determination.
meanings.sent5: In the world of science, every problem is viewed as solvable given enough time and effort.
